Valuation Methodologies

Asset Approach

Book value, adjusted net worth, and liquidation value methods for asset-heavy businesses.

Market Approach

Comparative analysis using recent sales of similar businesses and market multiples.

Income Approach

Discounted cash flow and capitalization methods based on earning potential.
